tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Consulted Dr. Rashmi Roogi for pregnancy and childbirth. 
(At Motherhood Hospital Banashankari, Ovum hospital Banashankari,  Raghavi Speciality Clinic Banashankari)

I was nervous about the whole process of pregnancy and childbirth and was hoping to find a doctor who could really understand my problems. And one fine day, I discover this Angelic Doctor !

Words fall short to describe her professionalism and sense of approach, truly one of a kind. She was patient enough to listen and understand my concerns and always helped to overcome them. No matter what the issue was, she was all ears. Rarely do we find such a  great Doctor !  

With such a great experience with her, I have been praising her among my family and friends so much so that even people in my hometown are familiar with her name.  We were truly impressed and amazed by her.  

All through this journey, she has been a  great support system, truly a gem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Other Gynaecological Conditions,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
*** *** **** **** ****** * **** ****** ** ****. I have met Rashmi mam at Motherhood hospital Bhanshankari branch sooner after I get positive pregnancy test. Trust me she z not only best doctor but our friend/relation sometimes felt like motherly touch. 
She took care from every aspect of pregnancy point and do tests/treatment which really requires. She will be very positive and makes u comfortable even at difficult situations.
From 2nd month till post delivery she traveled with me and I'm happy mother now ðŸ˜€ and she is one who has done procedure for me as I got breech baby and I was made so comfortable at situations. I was heard from other fellow mothers who experienced the same by Rashmi mam.

She will get in touch and follow up for our treatment and get in touch on WhatsApp for updates, which I feel almost no doc does and she will do same for all patients whom she treat.

Over all I strongly recommend this wonderful n humble n humanitarian n strongly technical doctor with vast knowledge n experience for all our Happy mothers n r for planning ones.
Rashmi mam you are godess/angel. I and my family got touched by you and we truly owe you a lot for rest of our lives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: * ***** *** *** *** **** ************* she treated like a family member. She was always available on message call. She helped me during my pregnancy and post pregnancy as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife's  sugar level and BP level was fluctuated during pregnancy, Madam handle it very nicely without any complications. Also Madam handles every situation very nicely during pregnancy period. As planned Madam has done the delivery without any problems. Finally Very nice Doctor.. Never saw such doctor..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Rashmi is very friendly and we had wonderful experience from day 1 till the discharge.She explained each and everything during pregnancy stage starting from consultation. *** ** *** ****** *** ****** ****** * **** ***.I suggest each and everyone to consult Dr Rashmi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review:
I have been visiting Dr.Rashmi from last 1 and half year she is so kind and listen our problems and give treatment. I had so many issues before getting pregnant she sorted out all health issue and she always motivates us to keep us strong.
She also does scanning where she is closely moniter everything and we can call her anytime she always attend us with smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr. Rashmi for antenatal care. She is friendly and empathetic. She was answering each and every query of me. She was always available for me whenever I had concerns and doubts. I never met such doctor till date who is more like a relative. 
I wished to undergo delivery under her but I have to travel to my moms place for delivery as she doesnâ€™t stay at Bangalore. I highly recommend this doctor for everyone *** ***** ** *** * **** ********* ***** Thank you Dr Rashmi Roogi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Roogi was more like a friend than a doctor to me. Made me at home always with her calm & soothing words. 
With regard to my pregnancy journey, it would never have been so simple without her. She never suggested any medicines for simple illness like cold etc & advised to take natural care. Thanks to her for all the support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had an infection on my surgical stiches and undergone surgery. For long my wound is not healed up and finally I met Dr. Reshmi and really gave me a follow up treatment . She used to text me often and check my status . Such a lovely and friendly Dr. And finally my wounds healed up after her treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Rashmi is very humble, caring and experienced Gynecologist, she us extremely good, I appreciate for her at most patience while treating as a mother to child and friendly, I want to tell that she is an extraordinary human being. Thank you Madam for showing so much of care and concern....

review:
*** ** *** **** *** ** ****** Friendly, boosts confidance by positive talk, all info given in advance, available whenever is needed.. my entire pregnancy journey was smooth and memorable I had zero tension even while admitted to hospital for delivery.. .. all thanks to Rashmi ma'am.. i visited Raghavi clinic and for scan and delivery, motherhood hospital. 

I would definitely (100%)recommend Rashmi ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I highly recommend Doctor Rashmi Mam for all pregnency related consultation.
They say doctors are equal to god, same with Rashmi mam she took care of my entire maternity journey with so much of care. The confidence which she gave from starting till end and post pregnency was ultimate and I was completly depended on her words.Lastly anytime you reach out to her she will respond back with a solution to your pain.Loads of respect and tons of thanks for treating me.

review:
Wonderful doctor. Very calm and smiling face. Doesn't get irritated by silly doubts of a first pregnant woman. Remembers every small details about the patient which gives a personal touch to the patient- doctor relationship.  Extremeoy satidfied with her cosdultation. Will visit her for sure when i am going to have my 2nd child.
Will recommemd her to everyone. Thank you so much Doctor for being there when needed.. ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜€

review: Dr. Rashmi is a true friendly doctor, concerned about her patient's health. I met her first in December 2018 and she helped me find some of the route causes to my health conditions and suggested some lifestyle changes for long term benefits. I have resolved some of my health issues following her advise and by seeking help and guidance.
